TopicTitle: My custom part doesn't load texture correctly

Articles.Content:
Hi, I\'ve made a simple custom part, just a cylinder basically.

The model, collider and stack nodes all work and I can use the part in the game. But it does not load the texture, the model is just black.

Here is the model ingame.

As you can see the model works as it should, but the texture does not :s

Anyone knows what I did wrong and/or how to fix it?

Thanks

Check out this post: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4032.msg248040#msg248040
